exit.detailedDescription: The hall is dark, but sparse torches hang along the way.

exit.description: To the south, the narrow hall runs further down.

exit.description: To the west, a door hangs loosely on wooden hinges.
exit.detailedDescription: A voice is moaning pitifully within.

prop.description: The walls are of grey stone.
prop.detailedDescription: Large stones are press into the wet, dirt walls.

prop.description: A boy is chained to the wall at the wrists.
prop.detailedDescription:
The boy is weak, but lifts his head and speaks, "You are unbound? You must help Nyellin. The goblins took her west. They whipped her cruelly. Did you not hear her cries? Go take the whip from her cell before they return."
